titleStmt.title: The history of the reign of Lewis XIII, King of France and Navarre containing the most remarkable occurrences in France and Europe during the minority of that prince / by Mr. Michel LeVassor.
Histoire du règne de Louis XIII. English
titleStmt.author: Le Vassor, Michel, 1646-1718.
